about.title: About Us
about.intro: Welcome to our student council website
about.mission_body: To empower students and create a vibrant community where every voice is heard and every idea matters.
about.values_integrity_desc: Acting with honesty and strong moral principles in all our actions
about.values_teamwork_desc: Working together to achieve common goals and support each other
about.values_innovation_desc: Embracing new ideas and creative solutions to challenges
about.history_journey: Our journey has been filled with achievements and growth. From humble beginnings, we have grown into a leading student organization.
